rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a small foyer area designed according to Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow. Includes built-in storage for keys and shoes.
Open concept living area with floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light and ventilation. Adorned with Chettinad design elements such as carved wooden panels and traditional motifs.
Adjacent to the living room, featuring a compact dining space that can double as an informal seating area. Designed for flexible use on a tight budget.
Functional kitchen with efficient layout and ample storage. Equipped with standard appliances to maximize space and minimize cost, incorporating Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
Primary bathroom located conveniently near the kitchen. Designed with efficient fixtures and natural ventilation in mind.

openings.description: Large, inviting front door with a glass panel above to enhance natural light while ensuring security.
Floor-to-ceiling windows on both sides of the living room for maximum natural illumination and cross ventilation.
High windows to improve kitchen brightness and airflow, designed to complement Chettinad aesthetics.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with built-in closets. Floor-to-ceiling windows on one side for natural light and ventilation, incorporating Vastu principles of placement.
Cozy bedroom designed with a compact layout. Includes window options to ensure adequate lighting and fresh air.
Secondary bathroom for guest or child use, featuring efficient plumbing fixtures and natural ventilation.

openings.description: Small balcony space for morning light and ventilation, designed with minimal cost impact.
Well-placed window to ensure adequate daylight penetration and cross ventilation.
